title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade and Minister for Defence) 
Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (tanaiste minister foreign affair trade minister defence) order 2025

title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of
heading: 2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose
text_raw:
2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose 
address have been deposited at the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, 
is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Foreign 
Affairs and Trade with effect from the date opposite mention of that person.
text_norm: 2 person mentioned schedule particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser tanaiste minister foreign affair trade effect date opposite mention person

title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of
heading: 3. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose
text_raw:
3. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose 
address have been deposited at the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, 
is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Defence 
with effect from the date opposite mention of that person.
text_norm: 3 person mentioned schedule particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser tanaiste minister defence effect date opposite mention person

title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of
heading: 4. Matthew Lynch, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
4. Matthew Lynch, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to the Tánaiste and Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade with effect from 23 
January 2025 to 21 February 2025.
text_norm: 4 matthew lynch particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser tanaiste minister foreign affair trade effect 23 january 2025 21 february 2025

title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of
heading: 5. Matthew Lynch, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
5. Matthew Lynch, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to the Tánaiste and Minister for Defence with effect from 23 January 2025 to 21 
February 2025. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [299] 3 

Sarah Bardon 

Joanne Lonergan 

Jack O’Donnell 

Stephen Kinsella 

Pauric McPhillips
